Class NextPieceRenderer

java.lang.Object
com.comp2042.view.renderer.NextPieceRenderer
public class NextPieceRenderer extends Object
Handles rendering of next pieces and held piece previews. Manages the display of upcoming pieces and the held piece.

    • updateHeldPiece

      public void updateHeldPiece(int[][] heldBrickData)
      Updates the held piece display.
      Parameters:
      heldBrickData - The shape matrix of the held piece, or null if no piece is held

    • updateNextPieces

      public void updateNextPieces(List<int[][]> nextShapes)
      Updates the next pieces display.
      Parameters:
      nextShapes - List of shape matrices for the next pieces

    • clearNextPieces

      public void clearNextPieces()
      Clears all next piece displays.
